channel.title: Fight pits 317 delta base!
channel.description:
Hello,
I was wondering if somebody could help me, I have been trying to make it so when there is a certain amount of players left in the fight pits npc's start to spawm but i cant seem to do it, I have tried to do it with the pits timers and also the playerispitgame etc but no luck. If somebody could help me it would be apreciated. Or if you know a guide for it could you copy and paste the link.
Thank you very much.
